mapper.insert: insert into T_DECORATION_NOTICE (DECORATION_NOTICE_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (T_ENTER_APPLY_ID_SEQ.Nextval, #{title}, #{content,}, #{creationTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select DECORATION_NOTICE_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from T_DECORATION_NOTICE
